title: Traits and Features
content: 2m. Elf Tiefling Dwarf Half-Elf Half-Orc Base Racial Speed Trait The distance you can move per turn is 9m.Gold Dwarves, Shield Dwarves, Lightfoot Halflings and Strongheart Halflings move 7.5 m per turn.
